dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: So, Host B, big news out of Amazon this past week, huh? Jeff Bezos, uh, stepping down as CEO.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, Host B, big news out of Amazon this past week, huh? Jeff Bezos, uh, stepping down as C E O.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jassy, who currently leads Amazons burgeoning cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services, will take on the role following a year in which Amazon reported massive profit and hired half a million people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, absolutely huge. And Andy Jassy, who's been, like, running AWS, their cloud division, he's taking the reins. But, like, what a time to step in, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, absolutely huge. And Andy Jassy, who's been, like, running A W S, their cloud division, he's taking the reins. But, like, what a time to step in, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jassy, who currently leads Amazons burgeoning cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services, will take on the role...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. I mean, the article mentions it's been a *tough* year for them. Massive losses reported, half a million people laid off. That's a huge number.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. I mean, the article mentions it's been a tough year for them. Massive losses reported, half a million people laid off. That's a huge number.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jassy, who currently leads Amazons burgeoning cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services, will take on the role following a year in which Amazon reported massive profit and hired half a million people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for sure. And Jassy's not just, you know, inheriting the usual e-commerce giant stuff. He's got, uh, a lot on his plate.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for sure. And Jassy's not just, you know, inheriting the usual e-commerce giant stuff. He's got, uh, a lot on his plate.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, like intensifying regulatory scrutiny, right? Plus, shareholders are really pushing for better diversity practices and civil rights impact.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, like intensifying regulatory scrutiny, right? Plus, shareholders are really pushing for better diversity practices and civil rights impact.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But he will also have to manage intensifying regulatory scrutiny and growing calls from shareholders to improve the companys diversity practices and impact on civil rights...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlaps] Right, and then there's the whole entertainment content push, especially after that massive MGM acquisition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and then there's the whole entertainment content push, especially after that massive M G M acquisition.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...while helping to integrate and develop entertainment content after Wednesdays of Amazons $8.45 billion acquisition of film studio MGM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that was an $8.45 billion sale! Just huge. What did Bezos even say about Jassy taking over? The article made it sound a bit... weird.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that was an eight point four five billion dollar sale! Just huge. What did Bezos even say about Jassy taking over? The article made it sound a bit... weird.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...Amazons $8.45 billion acquisition of film studio MGM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: It did! He apparently said Jassy's only been there less than a year, which is odd, given he led AWS. And then, like, "Andy will let the universe make us typical." Uh, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It did! He apparently said Jassy's only been there less than a year, which is odd, given he led A W S. And then, like, Andy will let the universe make us typical. Uh, what?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Andy is well known inside the company, and has been at Amazon almost as long as I have, Bezos said during his final annual meeting as CEO Wednesday. Andy will never let the universe make us typical.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Very Bezos. And he was trying to assure investors, saying they'll innovate aggressively, autonomous vehicles, satellites... even though, like, they just reported huge losses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Very Bezos. And he was trying to assure investors, saying they'll innovate aggressively, autonomous vehicles, satellites... even though, like, they just reported huge losses.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos sought to reassure investors that the company had a bright future under its new leader and told them the company will continue to innovate aggressively despite its massive scale, including investments in autonomous delivery vehicles and a satellite program known as Kuiper to provide low-latency, high-speed broadband.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm. And speaking of challenges, the D.C. government just slapped them with an antitrust lawsuit, didn't they? Accusing them of, uh, inflating prices.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm. And speaking of challenges, the D C government just slapped them with an antitrust lawsuit, didn't they? Accusing them of, uh, inflating prices.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The case alleges that Amazon has prevented sellers in its online marketplace from charging lower prices than those available elsewhere, keeping prices and profits high.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Yep, first one from a U.S. government agency. And Bezos's response to competition was also pretty wild. He said their cloud businesses face "zero competition" in non-competitive industries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep, first one from a U S government agency. And Bezos's response to competition was also pretty wild. He said their cloud businesses face zero competition in non-competitive industries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos pointed to Amazons cloud businesses, suggesting that they operate in competitive industries with other players that are growing quickly, including Twilio and Snowflake. We face intense competition from well-established companies everywhere we do business, in every industry, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Zero competition? Come on. [chuckles] I mean, he also said, "We welcome scrutiny and we fear it." Like, which one is it, Jeff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Zero competition? Come on. I mean, he also said, We welcome scrutiny and we fear it. Like, which one is it, Jeff?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We recognize that with success comes scrutiny and we welcome it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And shareholders, they're not holding back either. A proposal for a third-party civil rights audit actually got majority support.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And shareholders, they're not holding back either. A proposal for a third-party civil rights audit actually got majority support.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Another proposal that received significant attention but failed to get majority support had called for the company to conduct a third-party audit of its impact on civil rights, similar to studies conducted by Facebook and Airbnb.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and employee issues too! Alicia Boler Davis, a VP who resigned, actually said the company is vowing to become "Earth's worst and least safe employer." Oof.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and employee issues too! Alicia Boler Davis, a V P who resigned, actually said the company is vowing to become Earth's worst and least safe employer. Oof.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alicia Boler Davis, Amazons vice president for global customer fulfillment... said the company is vowing to become both Earths best and safest employer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: That's a pretty damning quote, Host B. So, Jassy's got, uh, regulatory battles, activist shareholders, *and* disgruntled employees. It's a lot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a pretty damning quote, Host B. So, Jassy's got, uh, regulatory battles, activist shareholders, and disgruntled employees. It's a lot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Bezos himself, uh, kinda predicted it won't be easy for Andy, even "unsatisfying, and oftentimes boring."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Bezos himself, uh, kinda predicted it won't be easy for Andy, even unsatisfying, and oftentimes boring.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While it wont be easy, I do predict Andy will also find it satisfying, and oftentimes fun, Bezos said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, that's one way to welcome your successor, I guess. He's certainly got his work cut out for him.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, that's one way to welcome your successor, I guess. He's certainly got his work cut out for him.
